translations: v.喷射；喷出（jet 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: The president will be jetting off to Germany today.
sentences.translation: 总统今天要乘喷气式飞机去德国。

sentences.sentence: Dayna's description of jetting around the world on C.I.A. missions is also bleak.
sentences.translation: Dayna在描写乖坐喷气式飞机执行中情局“周游全世界”的任务时也十分黯淡。

sentences.sentence: Set-jetting is the trend of traveling to destinations that are first seen in movies.
sentences.translation: Set-jetting指将电影拍摄地作为目的地的旅游，即“电影主题旅游”。
